sentences.en: Both of these positions are erroneous.
sentences.cn: 这两个意见都大错特错.

sentences.en: Errors in the inventory results may lead to erroneous subsequent decisions.
sentences.cn: 清查结果中的误差可能导致之后错误的决定.

sentences.en: Errors in the inventory results may lead to erroneous subsequent dicisions.
sentences.cn: 清查结果中的误差可能导致错误的决定.

sentences.en: Exposure to the air will lead to erroneous results.
sentences.cn: 若把样品暴露在空气中,测定结果会有很大误差.

sentences.en: He has an erroneous opinion about the problem.
sentences.cn: 他对那个问题有错误的看法.

sentences.en: His economic predictions are based on some erroneous assumptions.
sentences.cn: 他的经济预测是基于错误假设之上的。

sentences.en: I thought my answer was correct, but it was erroneous.
sentences.cn: 我原以为我的答案是对的, 可结果却是错的.

sentences.en: In no circumstances should erroneous ideas be allowed to spread unchecked.
sentences.cn: 决不允许错误思想到处泛滥.

sentences.en: It's erroneous to assume that the press always prints the truth.
sentences.cn: 认为新闻报导总是发表真相,这是错误的.

sentences.en: No erroneous ideas should be allowed to spread unchecked.
sentences.cn: 不能听任错误思想自由泛滥.

sentences.en: Proper measures were taken as soon as the erroneous ideas cropped up.
sentences.cn: 错误思想一冒头,就及时采取了措施.

sentences.en: Secular disequilibrium of uranium can lead to erroneous results.
sentences.cn: 铀的永久不平衡会导致错误的结果.

sentences.en: Some people have the erroneous notion that one can contract AIDS by giving blood.
sentences.cn: 一些人错误地认为献血会让人感染艾滋病。

sentences.en: The use of negative numbers led to erroneous conclusions.
sentences.cn: 负数的使用导致谬误的结论.

sentences.en: They have arrived at some erroneous conclusions.
sentences.cn: 他们得出了一些错误的结论。

sentences.en: You ought to examine yourself honestly and find out the source of your erroneous views.
sentences.cn: 你应该老老实实地反躬自省,找出你这些错误观点的根源.

trans.tran_en: erroneous ideas or information are wrong and based on facts that are not correct
